## AABBTree.rayIntersectionDistance() method

Checks for intersection between a ray and the AABB tree

**Signature:**

```typescript
rayIntersectionDistance(ray: Ray): number;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

ray


</td><td>

[Ray](doc/markdown/./base.ray.md)


</td><td>

The ray being traced


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

number

The distance between the ray origin and the hit point if the ray hits the AABB tree, null otherwise
